name: usertour
description: Usertour is a self-hosted platform for creating in-app tours, onboarding flows, and product walkthroughs. It injects guided steps into your apps and provides analytics via a web dashboard.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Create product tours and onboarding flows with a visual drag-and-drop editor

features.title: Conditional Logic
features.description: Show different tour steps based on user behavior or attributes

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track tour completion rates and user engagement to optimize onboarding

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Match tour appearance to your brand with custom CSS and themes

features.title: User Segmentation
features.description: Show different tours to different user segments or roles
